title: Riddle me this!
body: Does mid lane have two more towers than the other lanes, or one less?

replies.body: Neither. The base does not count as a lane.

I ......... I don't know. 

Why you do this
Has the same amount as top and bot lanes. Inhib and nexus towers are not lane towers.

> [{quoted}](name=Roguestoney,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=UwzvIvOi,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-05-16T23:19:50.040+0000)
>
> Has the same amount as top and bot lanes. Inhib and nexus towers are not lane towers.

inhib tower is still lane towers, but nexus towers aren't

Considering when the lane falls, any lane that is, then they jump your turrets It may be that lanes fault, but it's not their turrets. It's your teams. The lane don't own Nexus turrets, your base does and your base isn't a lane {{champion:99}} <3
2 more - if you count the nexus towers.
